scripts.test: echo Error: no test specified && exit 0
scripts.dev: concurrently --success first --kill-others -c green,yellow,cyan,blue -n FRVR,PHUB,PACK,ELCT "npm run api-hotreload-start" "tail -f ./../.forever/phub.log" "node webpack.js" "npm run electron"
scripts.api-hotreload-start: npm run forever-restart && chokidar "app.js" "src/**/*.js" -c "npm run increment && npm run forever-restart"
scripts.increment: npm test && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify({...(require('./package.json')), version: require('./package.json').version.split('.').map((v, i) => {if(i==2) return Number(v) + 1; return v}).join('.')}, null, 2))"
scripts.forever-restart: forever restart phub || npm run forever-start
scripts.start: (clear || cls || true) && npm run compile && npm run production
scripts.oddit: npm shrinkwrap && npm audit && del npm-shrinkwrap.json
scripts.dashboard: (npm run forever-stop >nul 2>&1 || true) && nodejs-dashboard -- node -r nodejs-dashboard app.js --disable-electron
scripts.clear: RMDIR /S /Q vids && RMDIR /S /Q temp && DEL /Q videos.nedb
